CTRE 0.1.0
  • Reference

Extract event magnitudes

magnitudes.Rd

Return the event magnitudes of a ctre object.

magnitudes(ctre, ...)

Arguments

ctre

A ctre object
...

Additional arguments passed to future methods.

Value

A numeric vector of event magnitudes

Examples

  library(magrittr)
  bitcoin %>% ctre() %>% magnitudes()
